item.title: ‘Saint Clare’ Review: Bella Thorne Kills Bad Guys in a Flashy but Garbled Thriller
item.description: Mitzi Peirone’s 2018 first feature “Braid” was a series of kinky dress-up games posing as a thriller, one that valued style over substance to such a point that there was almost nothing solid for a vie
